page.content: In this area employment is often {difficult}to find, although there is some{temporary work}in the summer {tourist season.}According to the Manpower Services Commision, 781 men and 362 women were{employed}in the local area in{July '85,}making a total of{13% of the workforce.}Of those people who have employment, according to our survey,{17%}were office workers,{27%}unskilled manual workers and{24%}skilled. {17%}were professionally trained and{5%}self employed.{80%}of the sample were {unsatisfied}with their{jobs}and{58%} would like further training in order to fulfil ambitions.{16%}of the survey had changed their work over the last three years. Because of the large number of{elderly people}in the area, many{workers are employed in service {industries related to their needs.
